title: Strictly's Saffron Barker 'never imagined' she and AJ Pritchard would become so close
text:

Strictly Come Dancing's Saffron Barker, 19, and AJ Pritchard, 24, have shared the reason for their strong connection on and off the dancefloor.

The genetically-blessed pair, who have previously shut down rumours of being struck with the Strictly curse, gushed over their friendship away from the show as they attended the Global Gift Gala together at the Kimpton Fitzroy Hotel in London on Thursday night.

Speaking to Mirror Online at the event, the pair discussed how they have become close out of the dance studio which Saffron 'never imagined' - which they credit to 'spending so many hours together' and 'experiencing the same highs and lows.'

Revealing she was taken off guard by striking up such a great connection with AJ, Saffron told: "Honestly I never could have imagined it, I think there is always talk about how close everybody gets and you kind of think 'aww really?' but it is really true!"

(Image: Brett D. Cove / SplashNews.com)

She continued: "Not only have I become such great friends with AJ, I’ve become friends with so many of the other cast aswell."

Sharing why she believed they have a deep friendship bond, the YouTube star told: "I think because you spend so many hours together."

AJ added: "You go through the same situations, you perform in front of 12 million people you have the same highs and the same lows."

He continued: "So you connect with somebody in a way maybe you wouldn’t in a normal way, so obviously you are going to get some close friendships."

(Image: SIPA USA/PA Images)

For their evening out, the pair ensured they pulled out all the stops.

Saffron rocked a chic black trouser suit teamed with a white lace bra that could be spied thanks to the plunging neckline of her blazer.

She completed the ensemble with some bold eye make-up and blue heeled sandals.

The social media sensation wore her locks down in tousled, flowing waves that framed her face.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

Dashing AJ opted for a more extravagant red and black metallic blazer, with a classic bowtie, black trousers and brogues.

They were hitting up the star-studded charity nightto raise funds for the Global Gift Foundation which aims to improve the lives of women, children and families all around the globe.

It was hosted by none other than Britain's Got Talent's David Walliams , and prize winners included Simon Cowell taking home the Philanthropist Award and singer Paloma Faith earning the Empowerment Award.
description: EXCLUSIVE: The Strictly couple have revealed why they have such a deep connection on and off the dancefloor
